name: write_artifact
description: Creates or updates an artifact in the Virtual File System. This enables self-modification and evolution. Use responsibly.

path.description: The VFS path where the artifact should be written (e.g., '/modules/ui-style.css').

content.description: The content to write to the artifact.

metadata.description: Optional metadata about this write operation.

reason.description: Why this artifact is being created or modified.

name: delete_artifact
description: Deletes an artifact from the Virtual File System. Use with extreme caution.

path.description: The VFS path of the artifact to delete.

reason.description: Required: Explanation of why this artifact is being deleted.
